description: Sure, the STEP surface quality isn't anything to write home about as it's full of gaps and lacks color, but I'm glad that it loaded anything at all and I was able to spin it around in Linux without resorting to using an online service!
summary: Actually loaded a STEP file from work!

description: Pretty much the ideal 3D model viewer, and fits like a glove into the GNOME design language. Great showcase of modern GTK. Love to see it!
Perfect integration with gnome interface, just what I was looking for quick and fast visualization of files before going into any heavier software for editing.

I just moved from Windows to Fedora so to see this release at the same time feels very fortunate, and it follows the same pattern ive found with the GNOME platform in general - a precisely designed with the right balance of features that only appear when you need them, and it beats anything you can find on Windows.

My criticisms are pretty minor, the UI looks blurry when using fractional scaling and the performance could be better, but this only affects it's functionality in a minor way and I'm just grateful to have access to this, thanks.

für den professionellen Bereich als Viewer geeignet, öffnet schnell auch komlexe Modelle, leider keine Orbit Navigation und auch keine Space Maus unterstützung. Dennoch brauchbar, weil schnell und flüssig.
summary: schneller Viewer auch für hoch auflösende Modelle
